text:
Željka Cvijanović (born 2 August 1967), is a Bosnian Serb politician. She is the 9th and current President of Republika Srpska.
She was the 11th Prime Minister of Republika Srpska from 12 March 2013 to 19 November 2018.
On 7 October 2018 she was elected to be President of Republika Srpska. Cvijanović is a member of the Alliance of Independent Social Democrats.
